---
title: "Contact"
---

Get in touch.  Your email won't be sold and I won't send you spam.

```{=html}
<form action="https://formspree.io/f/mwvpgrez" method="POST">
  <div class="contact-field">
    <label for="name">Name</label><br>
    <input id="name" type="text" name="name" required>
  </div>

  <div class="contact-field">
    <label for="email">Email (so I can reply)</label><br>
    <input id="email" type="email" name="email" required>
  </div>

  <div class="contact-field">
    <label for="message">Message</label><br>
    <textarea id="message" name="message" rows="7" required></textarea>
  </div>

  <!-- Honeypot -->
  <input type="text" name="_gotcha" style="display:none">

  <input type="hidden" name="_subject" value="New message from Infinite Limit">

  <button type="submit">Send</button>
  <input type="hidden" name="_next" value="/thanks.html">

</form>
```
